name: AC Hotel Barcelona Forum by Marriott

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at AC BCN the last two nights of our fabulous vacation. After spending the week in the heart of Born we wanted to relax near the beach.
reviews.title: Surprisingly old fashioned

reviews.text: I had read lots positive comments on AC Barcelona and expected it to be a modern design hotel and I must say I was very disappointed. The 13 floor pool and sunbathing area was great and the restaurant was ok (a bit expensive though), but otherwise the hotel was surprisingly shabby, even old fashioned. Broken lobby table, rugged carpets, broken fire alarm hanging on the wall - little things that make a sloppy impression, Our room was the greatest disappointment: stuffy smell, television was straight from the 80's, cheapest possible cd player, our sea side view meant gray roofs and walls... The room had absolute nothing to do with design hotel, more like a very basic two star hotel in the countryside.
reviews.title: Great Hotel for business or pleasure

reviews.text: So if you're a fan of design hotels and not booking a junior suite, don't expect much from the room!
reviews.title: Very Nice hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have just returned from a business trip from barcelona and was very impressed with the AC Barcelona. The location is great to explore the city, the rooms are modern and spacious, great bar area and the pool on the 13th floor is worth a visit for the views even if you dont swim! My only reservation was the service which was very slow on all occassions and not polite staff although everything else was well above my expectations. Well worth a visit.
reviews.title: Mostly business, or maybe peace

reviews.text: We stayed at the AC Barcelona for one night in April 2008. It is really nice business hotel. We stayed on a bed and breakfast basis. The room was good with a nice sea view. The breakfast was a self service buffet with a continental theme.
reviews.title: Ok for business, not for pleasure

likes.liked: — Location: too far away from the center of Barcelona

reviews.text: Stayed there for 3 nights for business. From outside the hotel is not impressive, the building looks more as an office block than a hotel. Once you are inside it's a different story, the lobby is very stylish, sleek design of rooms, wonderful views (I had a room on the 16th floor). The service was also very good, quick, good English, professional. I have especially liked the free minibar: i always hate those overpriced minbars in other hotels. I don't like to drink tap water, and I always end up overpaying for soft drinks from minibars.
reviews.title: Stylish business hotel

reviews.text: I wouldn't recommend this hotel for tourists, don't even think of a romantic weekend there. It's huge, impersonal, but stylish and functional. Also, very far from any tourist spot.
reviews.title: Good Business Hotel

reviews.text: After a recent hosting of a 3-day seminar at this facility, I can say that we were quite pleased. We have stuggled with accomodations in Barca in the past, as it's difficult to find that cost/quality/location balance - with here things were different.
reviews.title: Comfort and Convenience at a Price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We've just arrived home after spending 5 nights at the AC Barcelona hotel and I have to say after reading the mixed reviews about this hotel before we left England, I was really apprehensive about our stay.
reviews.title: What A Fab Hotel

likes.liked: — It was close to the beach and had great transport links

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We got there and loved it! It was clean, modern and the staff were friendly. They Spanish aren't people pleasers like us Brits and didn't go out of their way to be over friendly, but were pleasant all the same.
reviews.title: Not recommended

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The views from the hotel were amazing. One side you could see the beach and panoramic views of the city on the other side (which you can see even when you're relaxing in the jacuzzi or sauna)! Its quite quiet where the hotel is and is nice to get away from the city. Also, as its only five minutes walk from the beach, you can have a beach holiday and city break all in one!
reviews.title: Great hotel!!

reviews.text: We had room service the first night we got to the hotel and the food was little pricey, but I suppose that can be expected with all hotels. However, its close to a big shopping complex with a few outside eateries and there are other local cafe bars nearby.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel, great location.

reviews.text: The hotel is minutes walk from the Metro (El Marsame) and only takes about 7 minutes to get to La Rambla (get off at Metro stop Juame) Port Vell, Port Olimpic and Barceloneta and is on the tram route and tourist bus route.
reviews.title: Modern stylish hotel
